alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 5:09PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lea and western Gaines Counties through 700 PM CDT/600 PM MDT/... At 609 PM CDT/509 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Denver City, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Higginbotham and Paynes Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
